verses.name: Psalms 58:1
verses.text: Do ye indeed speak righteousness, O congregation? do ye judge uprightly, O ye sons of men?

verses.name: Psalms 58:2
verses.text: Yea, in heart ye work wickedness; ye weigh the violence of your hands in the earth.

verses.name: Psalms 58:3
verses.text: The wicked are estranged from the womb: they go astray as soon as they be born, speaking lies.

verses.name: Psalms 58:4
verses.text: Their poison is like the poison of a serpent: they are like the deaf adder that stoppeth her ear;

verses.name: Psalms 58:5
verses.text: Which will not hearken to the voice of charmers, charming never so wisely.
